aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.paragraph: At **ICT**, we are passionate about delivering innovative software solutions that tackle complex challenges and drive success for our clients. Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to staying at the forefront of the technology landscape, continuously learning and leveraging cutting-edge tools and methodologies to deliver top-quality results.

whatWeOffer.title: What We Offer
whatWeOffer.paragraph: Our company specializes in a range of services designed to meet diverse client needs, including:

items.title: Custom Software Development
items.paragraph: Building tailored solutions using Java, Force.com Apex, React.js, and other leading technologies.

items.title: Salesforce Development
items.paragraph: Crafting robust Salesforce applications and optimizing workflows to maximize efficiency.

items.title: Web and Frontend Development
items.paragraph: Creating intuitive, responsive user interfaces with React.js and jQuery.

items.title: Database Management
items.paragraph: Designing and maintaining efficient SQL-based data solutions.

items.title: Version Control & Collaboration
items.paragraph: Ensuring seamless project management through Git and other tools.

coreCompetencies.title: Core Competencies
coreCompetencies.paragraph: We pride ourselves on combining technical expertise with essential soft skills to ensure project success:

items.title: Collaboration and Teamwork
items.paragraph: Working closely with clients and teams to achieve shared goals.

items.title: Problem Solving and Critical Thinking
items.paragraph: Tackling challenges with innovative, strategic approaches.

items.title: Clear Communication and Active Listening
items.paragraph: Understanding client needs and translating them into actionable solutions.

items.title: Creativity and Goal Setting
items.paragraph: Delivering fresh ideas and consistently meeting project objectives.

ourApproach.title: Our Approach
ourApproach.paragraph: At **ICT**, we adhere to industry-standard Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles to develop scalable, maintainable systems. By integrating our expertise in Salesforce Development, React.js, and other advanced technologies, we provide clients with comprehensive, future-proof solutions.

ourTeam.title: Our Team
ourTeam.paragraph: Our multilingual team speaks **Polish**, **Russian**, and **English**, ensuring seamless communication across diverse projects. With a strong foundation in education and industry-recognized certifications, we deliver services grounded in expertise and trust.

items.paragraph: A commitment to excellence and innovation.
A team that adapts to evolving trends and technologies.
Solutions tailored to meet your unique business needs.

experience: Crafting backend logic for the application, including the creation of custom controllers and services
Designing and implementing the front-end of a B2B Commerce application, utilizing technologies such as JS, CSS, Handlebars, and jQuery
Enhancing code efficiency by applying Salesforce best practices, thereby boosting overall application performance
Tailoring the application to meet WCAG requirements, ensuring accessibility for a diverse user base
Formulating a development architecture that aligns with client specifications for new features and functionalities
Actively participating in client demo sessions to showcase and discuss the progress of development efforts
Reviewing and evaluating pull requests from team members to maintain code quality and adherence to standards
Collaborating within an agile Scrum framework to ensure effective communication and efficient project delivery

experience.position: Software Developer Intern (HTML, JS, Java, C#)
experience: Gained hands-on experience in developing software solutions by working on a personal and command project centered around web services
Developed effective communication and collaboration skills by working in a dynamic and multicultural environment
